channel.title: Comments on: “Unetaneh tokef” – Who wrote it?
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: y d
item.dc:creator: y d
item.description: Yahalom argues that unetaneh tokef is the siluk of a piyut by yannai, not kalir. what we have now, represents it after it was detached and re-attached to a kedushta piyut of kalir, the siluk of which went missing until recently.
item.content:encoded: Yahalom argues that unetaneh tokef is the siluk of a piyut by yannai, not kalir. what we have now, represents it after it was detached and re-attached to a kedushta piyut of kalir, the siluk of which went missing until recently.
